message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than $13,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?

Alice, thank you for considering my perspective. I still feel that $13,000 is a fair price for the product. However, if you're willing to meet me halfway, I would be open to discussing a price of $13,500.
